title: Wukong sale
body: Has wukong already been on sale this month? I just want to be sure, thank you!

replies.body: His Jade skin is on sale currently~ Or you could use IP to pick him up if you don't have the champion already~

It doesn't look like it. Keep an eye on the [**Sales Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) for any further sales announcements on when you can expect to see Wukong hit those mad discounts.

If you have any questions, let me know.
